title: [Alliance Embassy and Forums]
description: The tall crystal dome of the ceiling captures the light, bathing the room in a bright glow.  The center of the room is dominated by a marble table, surrounded by a dozen chairs.  A staircase leading up to the small loft of offices, wraps around the base of the dome.  On the east wall, rows of benches are arranged in a crescent moon pattern around an oak stage that rises out from the riverstone floor.  A wide parchment, encased in glass, is mounted atop an ironwood podium.
